name: OD-2r Turbo OverDrive pedal
details:
Two stages gain overdriveControls: Level, Tone, Drive, 2-way Mode switch
Connectors: Input, Output, AC Adaptor
Input Impedance: 1Mohm
Output Load Impedance: 10kohm or more
Equivalent Input Noise: -118dBm or less (IHF-A, Tone center, Input Short)
Recommended AC Adaptor: ACA Series
Current Draw: 10mA @ 9V
http://www.bossarea.com/boss-od-2r-turbo-overdrive/
